definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: give a feast (lit. perhaps bring (guests), invite; cf. As. karû, bring, kirêtu, feast, kireti iškun, he gave a feast, Dl :HWB 352);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf.. c. acc. cogn., [[לָהֶם כֵּרָה גְדוֹלָהוַיִּכְרֶה]] 2Ki 6:23 and he gave a great feast for them (the context requires this sense, but text dubious, Nö:ZMG 1886, 724, cf. Klo).
